mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ as userSeq, USER_ID as userId, NAME as name, EMAIL as email, BIRTH_DATE as birthDate, ACCOUNT_STATUS as accountStatus, NOTIFICATION_OPT_IN as notificationOptin, SIGNUP_DATE as signupDate FROM USERS ORDER BY USER_SEQ DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
